subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – human eye, now rotated 90 degrees. Compare the {{cog|egy|-}} hieroglyph {{m|egy|𓁹}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-mjak ~ s-mik}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|མིག||eye}}, {{cog|my|မျက်||eye, face}}.
